fullText: Morgan Freeman and Frances McDormand bring their considerable star power to bear on Clifford Odets' 1950 drama about an alcoholic actor trying to make a comeback, but despite their efforts, this revival feels oddly tepid.
dtliExcerpt: Morgan Freeman and Frances McDormand bring their considerable star power to bear on Clifford Odets' 1950 drama about an alcoholic actor trying to make a comeback, but despite their efforts, this revival feels oddly tepid.
